Translations.Text: (king said ja saw 7 fat cows zrat 7 skinny cows 7 zeleny spikes wheat) others shriveled O moj elders radit mna zretel moj dream ona zauzlit ako interpretovat dreams
They said Nonsense dreams When it pojdem interpretation z dreams my je knowledgeable
(Jeden saved zalar) said teraz he finally zapamatat si ja tell ona its interpretation so send mna Joseph
Joseph moj znamy informovat us 7 fat cows zrat 7 skinny cows 7 zeleny spikes others shriveled Ja zelat si do ist some informacia ludia
He said Co ona cultivate dalsi 7 rocnik when cas zatva pojdem lavy zrno ich spikes except for co ona jestn
After ze, 7 rocnik drought pojdem kto will consume vela z co ona stored them
After ze, rocnik pojdem brings relief ludia they znova potlacit ovocny juice
